summary: When people have free time, they may use it to engage in imaginative or playful activities.

keyphrase: Sibling relationships can involve playful teasing
summary: Interactions between siblings often include playful teasing or attempts to provoke one another.

keyphrase: Boredom can lead to mischievous behavior
summary: When individuals have nothing specific to occupy their time, they might resort to mischief or playful antics.
Family dynamics often include a mix of affection and playful conflict.
